mapper.select: SELECT POINT_SEQ ,USER_SEQ ,RENTAL_SEQ ,PREVIOUS_POINT ,( CASE POINT_STATUS WHEN '00' THEN '적립' WHEN '01' THEN '차감' WHEN '04' THEN '취소' END ) AS POINT_STATUS ,POINT_TRANSACTION ,TOTAL_POINT ,TRANSACTION_REG_DT FROM POINT WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq}

SELECT POINT_SEQ ,USER_SEQ ,RENTAL_SEQ ,PREVIOUS_POINT ,( CASE POINT_STATUS WHEN '00' THEN '적립' WHEN '01' THEN '차감' WHEN '04' THEN '취소' END ) AS POINT_STATUS ,POINT_TRANSACTION ,TOTAL_POINT ,TRANSACTION_REG_DT FROM POINT WHERE USER_SEQ = ( SELECT USER_SEQ FROM CUSTOMER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
SELECT TOTAL_POINT FROM POINT WHERE POINT_SEQ = ( SELECT MAX(POINT_SEQ) AS POINT_SEQ FROM POINT WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq})
SELECT POINT_SEQ, USER_SEQ, RENTAL_SEQ, PREVIOUS_POINT, POINT_TRANSACTION, TOTAL_POINT, POINT_STATUS, TRANSACTION_REG_DT FROM POINT WHERE RENTAL_SEQ = #{rentalSeq}
